sentences.sContent: Chief of state and government is the hereditary sultan (Qaboos of Oman), who appoints a cabinet to assist him.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chief of state and government is the hereditary sultan (Qaboos of Oman), who appoints a cabinet to assist him.
sentences.sCn: 国家元首和政府是世袭的苏丹(阿曼? 卡布斯)，他任命内阁来协助他。

synos.tran: 苏丹（某些伊斯兰国家统治者的称号）

trans.tranCn: 苏丹（某些伊斯兰国家统治者的称号）
trans.tranOther: a ruler in some Islamic countries
